name: connect2mongodb
description: Dynamically Connect to MongoDB databse & close connection.

scripts.build: npm run clean-lib && npm rum lint && tsc
scripts.test: npm run build && cd ./test && npm link connect2mongodb && node ./index.js
scripts.finalTest: npm run update && npm run clean-node-modules && npm i && npm run build && npm link connect2mongodb && cd ./test && node index.js && npm unlink connect2mongodb
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Updated to mongoose 8.10.0" && git push origin main

author: Priyal "Capta1n" Raj
